name: CardRaiser
description:
Welcome in HELL friend ! So, you wanted to explore ? Goodluck to escape this place, I'm wondering, are you enough fast to escape in ,, ? Anyways, you can't survive without some tips :

You are CardRaiser use your power cleverly, raise your card in the batlle with your upgrade slot and let them fight for you !

Explore !

Make your cards grow !

Explore more !!

Dynamic Card game

Assets : The"Peacefull_nightfield" by Trixie.

►Music : OVERWERK: Toccata

http://youtube.com/overwerk
